verses.roman:
tabe tāṅra vākya prabhu kari' aṅgīkāre
tāhā-sabā lañā gelā sārvabhauma-ghare

synonyms: tabe—thereupon; tāṅra—of Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; vākya—the words; prabhu—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kari'-doing; aṅgīkāre—acceptance; tāhā-sabā—all of them; lañā—taking; gelā—went; sārvabhauma-ghare—to the house of Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya.
translation: Accepting the request of Lord Nityānanda Prabhu, Lord Caitanya took all His devotees and went to the house of Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya.
